item.title: query views
item.description: Queries are build in a language called datalog, the presentation is done using Hiccup. Mixed in is Clojure, of which I know none. Debugging Usually I add one of these to view raw data from a query before I add custom hiccup view :view (fn [result] (for [r result] [:pre (pr-str r)])) :view (fn [result] (pr-str result)) Properties #+BEGIN_QUERY { :query [:find (pull ?
